analysis.summary: Amanda Ens, a Bank of America Merrill Lynch director, provides detailed market analysis and investment recommendations to Jeffrey Epstein and Richard Kahn, predicting a market pullback in 6-8 weeks due to potential tax reform delays and recommending buying SPX put options for May expiry as protection.
